author: humbedooh
msg: Fix some style issues, use a more persistent bucket for passing along data (and clean it up the right places), and remove in/out-put filters from the chain if need be.

author: jmpascal
msg: Support more dateFormat when parsing response.

author: ate
msg: RAVE-603: System bootstrap for jcr content services
- restructured initialization logic and order moving content services bootstrapping to a separate and standalone feature (no longer depending/needing jackrabbit classes nor classloader)
- wiring repository initialization and usage through new LazyRepositoryFactory with callback listeners to be invoked in order (of registration) when repository becomes available (and is shutdown)
wiring now no longer is initialized through servlets (web.xml) but can be plugged in and managed through spring configuration only

author: ludwig
msg: Added commons-io-2.4 as a runtime dependency.
